summary.para: An individual page in a document.
Provides access to a dictionary of additional actions to be performed when the page is opened or closed.
Provides access to the collection of annotation dictionaries that contain indirect references to all annotations associated with the page.
Indicates the tab order that shall be used for annotations on the page.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPage.ArtBox

summary.para: Specifies the art box defining the boundaries of the meaningful content (including potential white space) on a page as intended by the page's creator.

member.value: A object, specifying the art box.

summary.para: Provides access to the collection of indirect references to all article beads appearing on the page.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPage.BleedBox

summary.para: Specifies the bleed box defining the region to which the contents of the page shall be clipped when output in a production environment.

member.value: A object, specifying the bleed box.

summary.para: Provides access to a collection of indirect references to Web Capture command dictionaries describing commands that were used in building the PDF file.

Indicates the display duration of a page (also called its advance timing): the maximum length of time, in seconds, that the page shall be displayed during presentations before the viewer application shall automatically advance to the next page.
Indicates the digital identifier of the page's parent Web Capture content set.
Specifies the date and time when the page's contents were most recently modified.
Provides access to a metadata stream that contains metadata for the page.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPage.PieceInfo

summary.para: Provides access to a page-piece dictionary associated with the page.

member.value: A dictionary, containing the DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPieceInfoEntry objects, along with their keys.

summary.para: Specifies the page's preferred zoom factor, i.e. the factor by which it shall be scaled to achieve the natural display magnification.
Indicates the key of the page's entry in the structural parent tree.
Provides access to a stream object that defines the page's thumbnail image.
Provides access to a transition dictionary describing the transition effect that shall be used when displaying the page during presentations.
Specifies the group attributes dictionary that specifies the attributes of the page's page group for use in the transparent imaging model.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPage.TrimBox

summary.para: Specifies the trim box defining the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming.

member.value: A object, specifying the trim box.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPage.UserUnit

summary.para: Indicates the size of default user space units, in multiples of 1/72 inch.

member.value: A value. The default value is 1.0 (user space unit is 1/72 inch).

summary.para: Specifies the options applied to a text search.
Initializes a new instance of the PdfTextSearchParameters class with default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfTextSearchParameters.CaseSensitive

summary.para: Specifies whether or not to ignore the letter case when searching text in a PDF.

member.value: true, to take into account the letter case; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfTextSearchParameters.Direction

summary.para: Specifies the direction of text search.

member.value: A enumeration value, specifying the search direction.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfTextSearchParameters.WholeWords

summary.para: Specifies whether or not to take into account only whole words when searching text in a PDF.

member.value: true, if whole words should match the search criteria; otherwise false.

summary.para: Lists the values used to specify the permission to protect a PDF document in interactive operations.
Permit interactive operations in the PDF document.
Prohibit interactive operations in the PDF document except AcroForm filling and signing.
Prohibit all interactive operations in the PDF document.

summary.para: Contains settings to protect a PDF document with a password and user permissions.
Initializes a new instance of the PdfEncryptionOptions class with default settings.
Gets or sets data extraction permissions of the PDF document.
Gets or sets interactivity permissions of the PDF document.
Gets or sets modification permissions of the PDF document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfEncryptionOptions.OwnerPassword

summary.para: Gets or sets an owner password used to set document restrictions.

member.value: A object that is an owner password.

summary.para: Gets or sets printing permissions of the PDF document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfEncryptionOptions.UserPassword

summary.para: Gets or sets a user password to encrypt the document.

member.value: A object that is a user password.

summary.para: Lists the values used to specify the permission to protect a PDF document in data extraction operations.
Allow accessibility software that uses assistive technologies (such as a screen reader or Braille output devices) to use the document contents.
Permit data extraction operations (copying or text and graphics extraction from the document) including access for the software that uses assistive technologies.
Prohibit data extraction operations (copying or text and graphics extraction from the document) including access for the software that uses assistive technologies.
Lists the values used to specify the permission to protect a PDF document in printing operations.
Permit document printing.
Do not print the document at the highest quality level.
Prohibit document printing.
Lists the values used to specify the permission to protect a PDF document in modification operations.
Permit content modification (adding or text annotation modification, filling in interactive form fields or interactive form field modification) and document assembling.
Allow only document assembling such as inserting, rotating or deleting pages, as well as bookmark creation on the navigation pane.
Prohibit content modification (adding or text annotation modification, filling in interactive form fields or interactive form field modification) and document assembling.
A class that contains encryption and signed settings of a PDF document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.EncryptionOptions

summary.para: Provides access to encryption options of a PDF document.

member.value: A object that represents encryption options of a PDF document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.Signature

summary.para: Gets or sets the signature, which can contain signing info, reason and location, to be used to save the signed document.

member.value: A object that represents the PDF signature.

summary.para: An electronic signature used to sign a PDF file.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the PdfSignature class with the predefined certificate.

member.param: A object that is an X.509 certificate.

member.value: A object that is the contact information provided by the signer to a recipient.

member.value: A that is the filter name.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfSignature.Location

member.value: A object that is the location associated with the identity.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfSignature.Name

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the person or authority signing the document.

member.value: A object that is the person or authority name signing the document.

summary.para: Lists the values specifying the status of a PDF text search operation.
The text search has finished.
The text, which is being searched for, has been found.
The text, which is being searched for, has not been found.
Provides the PDF font options.
Indicates the maximum height above the baseline reached by glyphs in this font.
Indicates the average width of glyphs in the font.
The vertical coordinate of the top of flat capital letters, measured from the baseline.
Indicates the character names defined in a font subset.
Indicates the maximum depth below the baseline reached by glyphs in this font.
Provides access to a collection of flags defining various characteristics of the font.
Indicates a rectangle, expressed in the glyph coordinate system, that shall specify the font bounding box.
Indicates the preferred font family name.
Indicates the PostScript name of the font.
Indicates the font stretch value.
Indicates the weight (thickness) component of the fully-qualified font name or font specifier.
The angle, expressed in degrees counterclockwise from the vertical, of the dominant vertical strokes of the font.
Indicates the spacing between baselines of consecutive lines of text.
Indicates the maximum width of glyphs in the font.
The width to use for character codes whose widths are not specified in a font dictionary's Widths array.
Indicates the thickness, measured vertically, of the dominant horizontal stems of glyphs in the font.
Indicates the thickness, measured horizontally, of the dominant vertical stems of glyphs in the font.
Indicates the font's X-height: the vertical coordinate of the top of flat nonascending lowercase letters (like the letter x), measured from the baseline, in fonts that have Latin characters.
Specifies the coordinates of a PDF point.

A document contained in a PDF file.
Provides access to the document's interactive form (AcroForm) dictionary.
Provides access to a dictionary of additional actions defining the actions that shall be taken in response to various trigger events affecting the document as a whole.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowAccessibility

summary.para: Enables copying or otherwise extracting text and graphics from the document (in support of accessibility to users with disabilities or for other purposes).

member.value: true to support PDF accessibility; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowAnnotationsAndFormsModifying

summary.para: Enables adding and modifying text annotations and interactive form fields in the PDF.

member.value: true to allow making changes to the PDF annotations and form fields; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowDataExtraction

summary.para: Enables extracting data from the PDF.

member.value: true to allow extracting the PDF data; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowDocumentAssembling

summary.para: Enables inserting, rotating, or deleting PDF pages and creating navigation elements such as bookmarks or thumbnail images.

member.value: true to allow assembling the document; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowFormsFilling

summary.para: Enables filling in interactive form fields of the PDF file, as well as signing the document (which amounts to filling in existing signature fields, a type of interactive form field).

member.value: true to allow filling in interactive form fields in the PDF; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowHighQualityPrinting

summary.para: Enables printing the PDF in high resolution, so that a faithful digital copy of the PDF content is generated.

member.value: true to high quality printing; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowModifying

summary.para: Enables modifying the PDF.

member.value: true to allow modifying the PDF; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.AllowPrinting

summary.para: Enables printing the PDF.

member.value: true to allow printing the PDF; otherwise false.

summary.para: Returns the name of the person who created the document.
The date and time the document was created, in human-readable form.
If the document was converted to PDF from another format, the name of the conforming product that created the original document from which it was converted.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.Destinations

summary.para: Gets named destinations for targets in the document.

member.value: A dictionary, containing the DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDestination objects, along with their key values.

summary.para: Returns the keywords associated with the document.
Returns the culture-specific settings of the document.
Provides access to the document's structure tree root dictionary.
Provides access to the mark information dictionary that contains information about the document's usage of Tagged PDF conventions.
Provides access to a stream that contains the document metadata.
The date and time the document was most recently modified, in human-readable form.
Provides access to the document's name dictionary.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.NeedsRendering

summary.para: Indicates whether or not to expedite the display of PDF documents containing XFA forms.

member.value: true if the document shall be regenerated when the document is first opened; otherwise false. The default value is false.

summary.para: Indicates an action that shall be performed when the document is opened.
Indicates a destination that shall be displayed when the document is opened.
Provides access to the document's optional content properties dictionary.
Provides access to the outline dictionary that shall be the root of the document's outline hierarchy.
Provides access to the array of output intent dictionaries that specify the color characteristics of output devices on which the document might be rendered.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.PageLabels

summary.para: Provides access to the number tree defining the page labeling for the document.

member.value: A dictionary, containing the DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPageLabel objects, along with their integer key values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.PageLayout

summary.para: Indicates the page layout of the opened document.

member.value: A DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPageLayout enumeration value. The default value is SinglePage.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.PageMode

summary.para: Indicates the mode of displaying the opened document.

member.value: A DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPageMode enumeration value. The default value is UseNone.

summary.para: Provides access to the collection of document pages.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfDocument.PieceInfo

summary.para: Provides access to the page-piece dictionary associated with the document.

member.value: A dictionary, containing the DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPieceInfoEntry objects, along with their key values.

summary.para: If the document was converted to PDF from another format, the name of the conforming product that converted it to PDF.
Returns the subject of the document.
Provides access to the array of thread dictionaries that contains the document's article threads.
Returns the document's title.
A name object indicating whether the document has been modified to include trapping information.
Indicates the version of the PDF specification to which the document conforms if later than the version specified in the file's header.
Provides access to the viewer preferences dictionary specifying how to display the document on the screen.
A font assigned to a document text.
The PostScript name of the font.
Provides access to the PDF font options.

summary.para: A default localizer to translate the PDF Viewer's resources.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Pdf.Localization.PdfCoreResLocalizer.GetLocalizedString(DevExpress.Pdf.Localization.PdfCoreStringId)

member.param: A enumeration value, specifying the dialog message whose caption (text) is to be localized.
member.returns: A value, specifying the text to be displayed within the specified dialog message.

summary.para: Provides the means to localize the dialog messages of a PDF Viewer.
Initializes a new instance of the PdfCoreLocalizer class with default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Pdf.Localization.PdfCoreLocalizer.CreateResXLocalizer

member.returns: An object, storing resources based on the thread's language and regional settings (culture).

member.returns: A value, corresponding to the specified identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.Localization.PdfCoreLocalizer.Language

summary.para: Returns the name of the language currently used by this localizer object.

member.value: A value that specifies the language of the user interface localization.

summary.para: Contains strings that correspond to the dialog messages of the PDF Viewer that are subject to localization.
"Document"
"The document structure does not contain a field with the specified name: {0}."
"The argument should be the name of a button appearance or a value from the options array."
"The argument should be a string value or a list of string values from the options array."
"The CIE color space component value should be greater than or equal to 0."
"The color component value should be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 1."
"The dash length should be greater than or equal to 0."
"The sum of dash and gap lengths should be greater than 0."
"The dash pattern array must not be empty."
"The flatness tolerance should be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100."
"Ths font size should be greater than 0."
"Error while reading the PDF Form from the specified file."
"The gamma component value should be greater than 0."
"The gap length should be greater than or equal to 0."
"The glyph position should be less or equal than text length."
"The gray level should be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 1."
"The largest edge length should be greater than 0."
"The line width should be greater than or equal to 0."
"The list should contain at least one value."
"The marked content tag can't be empty."
"The miter limit should be greater than 0."
"The page art box should be less than or equal to the media box."
"The page bleeding box should be less than or equal to the media box."
"The page croppoing box should be less than or equal to the media box."
"The page number should be greater than 0."
"The page rotation angle can have one of the following values: 0, 90, 180 or 270 degrees."
"The page trimming box should be less than or equal to the media box."
"Input data are not recognized as valid pdf."
"The Document Open password is empty or incorrect."
"Unable to create a print document with the specified name: {0}."
"The top coordinate of the rectangle should be greater than the bottom."
"The right coordinate of the rectangle should be greater than the left one."
"The shading pattern name can't be empty."
"Transformation function Range size should be equal to alternate color space dimension."
"The text value can't be null."
"The argument should be a string value."
"The text horizontal scaling value should be greater than 0."
"This operation is not available while no document is being loaded."
"The color should have at least one component."
